text: Dayle Edward Coleing (born 23 October 1996) is a Gibraltarian professional footballer, who plays as a goalkeeper for NIFL Premiership side Glentoran and the Gibraltar national football team. ==Club career== ===Early career and breakthrough at Europa=== Beginning his career at Manchester 62, Coleing got his senior breakthrough at Lincoln Red Imps in 2014. However, after just one season, he would return to Manchester 62 ahead of a move to the UK, where he would study at Leeds Trinity University. There, he would play for the university side as well as non-league clubs Thackley and Liversedge. After completing his studies, Coleing returned to Gibraltar in 2017 to join Gibraltar Phoenix, however it would be at Europa where he would finally secure his place as first choice keeper during the 2019–20 season. His performances at club and international level subsequently attracted the attention of a number of overseas clubs, including Northern Irish side Glentoran.Coleing attracting interest from outside of Gibraltar Football Gibraltar. 20 July, 2020. Retrieved 5 August, 2020. However, Europa FC expressed a reluctance to let Coleing leave for Northern Ireland without triggering his £50,000 release clause, citing the UEFA coefficients when stating their belief that Glentoran would be a "sideways step" for the keeper."Europa FC is committed to give Dayle the opportunity he deserves at the level he deserves" States Europa FC Gibraltar Chronicle. 28 July 2020. Retrieved 5 August 2020. ===Glentoran=== Nonetheless, in August 2020 Glentoran offered the full £50,000 release fee for Coleing,Coleing move to Glentoran set to be confirmed this week Football Gibraltar. 10 August 2020. Retrieved 10 August 2020. and on 10 August Europa announced that Coleing had left the club.Farewell Dayle Europa FC on Twitter. 10 August 2020. Retrieved 10 August 2020. He was officially announced by the Glens the next day, becoming the first Gibraltarian to play for the Northern Irish side since Colin Ramirez in the 1993–94 season.Glentoran: Irish Premiership club sign international duo Gael Bigirimana and Dayle Coleing BBC Sport. 11 August 2020. Retrieved 11 August 2020. He kept a clean sheet on his debut in a 1-0 Europa League win over Havnar Bóltfelag.Europa League: Robbie McDaid strike gives Glentoran win over HB Tórshavn BBC Sport. 20 August 2020. Retrieved 21 August 2020. ==International career== Despite being involved with the senior team since 2014, Coleing made his international debut for Gibraltar on 5 September 2019, starting in the UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying match against Denmark. While studying in England, he also represented the England Universities North squad.Glentoran set to sign Gibraltar international keeper Dayle Coleing Belfast Telegraph. 5 August 2020. title: Dayle Coleing
